body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Access
  • Added Distance Type configuration to Accessibility Specification.
    • Distance Type options include Straight-Line and Estimated Driving Distance.
    • Straight-line Distance (As The Crow Flies) is the shortest distance from the zip+4 representative placement to the specific provider.
    • New Estimated Driving Distance is approximate undirected driving distance from the zip+4 representative placement to the specific provider.
    • All specifications created prior to the implementation of Distance Type are Straight-Line and will automatically have that selection.
  • Drive Time Estimation
    • Drive Time estimation is found within the distance table in the Accessibility Specification when Estimated Driving Distance is selected as the Distance Type.
    • Drive Time estimation is calculated based on the latest CMS published HSD Provider and Facility Network Adequacy standards.

Issues Fixed

Census Data
  • New Census data has been loaded based on the latest American Community Survey population estimates.
Recruiting List
  • Fixed an issue where zeros at the front of the zipcode+4 ids were being dropped, causing a confusing message.
